welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Earley, a charming town known for its picturesque streets and friendly locals. We hope you have a lovely stay and take some time to explore and experience all that Earley has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private jet passengers, providing a luxurious and efficient experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to high-end travelers and offers exclusive amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Benson Airport serves as a base for RAF operations and is restricted to military personnel only.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The busiest terminal at Heathrow, serving a mix of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly British Airways and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport for up to 4 hours.
